author: joey.chessher
title: Elevated Project Management Process
description: As the number of funded projects grow it becomes more difficult to Audit their progress and Monitor their impact using the existing process.
solution: Evaluate and Pilot a Professional Project Management product that is fully mature to operate in parallel with the existing auditing process.
experience:
Team has 20yrs + Project Mgmt / Staffing Experience.
PMP (Project Management Professional)
PMP Number 1413330 – May 28,2011 – May 27, 2023
